media.caption: Is Olly Robbins the man wielding the most influence over the shape of Brexit?

synopses.long: Little known outside Whitehall, Olly Robbins has kept out of the limelight despite having the prime minister's ear when it comes to Brexit - until now. As Theresa May's chief advisor on Europe some consider him to hold more influence than the real Brexit Secretary, David Davis. So who is Olly Robbins? Nick Watt reports.
synopses.medium: Little known outside Whitehall, Olly Robbins has until now, kept out of the limelight, despite having the prime minister's ear when it comes to Brexit.
synopses.short: Is Olly Robbins the man wielding the most influence over the shape of Brexit?

media.title: Is this who is really shaping Brexit?
